trans-unit.source: Provides the look and feel property settings to a workflow in design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: 为设计时环境中的工作流提供外观属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Workflow themes define the look and feel of a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 工作流主题定义工作流设计图面的外观。

trans-unit.source: This includes background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 这包括为工作流定义的背景样式、前景样式、字体以及图标。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is a theme defined for a specific workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> 是为特定工作流定义的主题。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> class can be used for default properties if a specific workflow theme is not desired.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要特定的工作流主题，则可以使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> 类以设置为默认属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> that describes default values for the look and feel of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" />，它描述 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> 外观的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> describes the look and feel of a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> 描述工作流设计图面的外观。

trans-unit.source: This includes background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 这包括为工作流设计图面定义的背景样式、前景样式、字体以及图标。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to access the `AmbientTheme` property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何访问 `AmbientTheme` 属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自“跟踪配置文件设计器”SDK 示例。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [跟踪配置文件设计器示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a duplicate theme.
trans-unit.target: 创建重复主题。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the newly-cloned theme.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示新克隆的主题的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use `Clone` to create a duplicate theme with property settings that match the cloning theme.
trans-unit.target: 使用 `Clone` 可创建一个重复主题，其中包含与所克隆主题相匹配的属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the directory part of the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath" /> 的目录部分。

trans-unit.source: The directory part of the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath" /> 的目录部分。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ContainingFileDirectory%2A> to get the directory part of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ContainingFileDirectory%2A> 可获取 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath%2A> 的目录部分。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeType" /> of the standard theme to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的标准主题的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeType" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a standard theme.
trans-unit.target: 创建标准主题。

trans-unit.source: The newly created <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CreateStandardTheme%2A> to create a new theme available anyone who uses the workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CreateStandardTheme%2A> 可创建一个供使用工作流设计器的任何人使用的新主题。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current theme.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前主题。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> that is used for display settings.
trans-unit.target: 用于显示设置的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A> to make changes to the theme used to display the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A> 可对用于显示工作流的主题进行更改。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> associated with a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A> 属性来访问与工作流关联的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DesignerGlyphProvider.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自工作流监视器 SDK 示例中的 DesignerGlyphProvider.cs 文件。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [工作流监视器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the description of the theme.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置主题的说明。

trans-unit.source: The description of the theme.
trans-unit.target: 主题的说明。

trans-unit.source: The property value cannot be set because the workflow theme is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 由于工作流主题是只读的，因此不能设置属性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of designer themes associated with the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 获取与工作流关联的设计器主题的列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of designer themes associated with the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 与工作流关联的设计器主题的列表。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.DesignerThemes%2A> to retrieve a list of designer themes that are associated with the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.DesignerThemes%2A> 可检索与工作流关联的设计器主题的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable change notification.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指示是否启用更改通知的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable change notification; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 则启用更改通知；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Enabling change notification causes the theme changed events to occur when changes to the theme are made.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用更改通知，则在对主题进行更改时会发生主题更改事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file path for the theme.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置主题的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: The file path for the theme.
trans-unit.target: 主题的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath%2A> represents the path to the file that stores the theme settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.FilePath%2A> 表示存储主题设置的文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: The property value cannot be set because the workflow theme is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 由于工作流主题是只读的，因此不能设置属性值。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, allows an object to clean up any resources deterministically.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，允许对象自行清理任何资源。

trans-unit.source: This method cleans up resources by calling <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A>(`false`).
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过调用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A>(`false`) 来清理资源。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> to customize the cleanup.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> 以自定义清理。

trans-unit.source: Generates a file path for the theme.
trans-unit.target: 生成主题的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: A new, unique file path for the theme.
trans-unit.target: 主题的新的唯一文件路径。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.GenerateThemeFilePath%2A> to create a unique file path for the theme.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.GenerateThemeFilePath%2A> 可为主题创建唯一的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: The activity designer from which to retrieve the theme.
trans-unit.target: 从中检索主题的活动设计器。

trans-unit.source: Gets the theme for the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> 的主题。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 与指定 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.GetDesignerTheme%2A> to retrieve the theme associated with a specified activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.GetDesignerTheme%2A> 可检索与指定活动设计器关联的主题。

trans-unit.source: Loads a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />.
trans-unit.target: 加载 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />。

trans-unit.source: The file path of the theme.
trans-unit.target: 主题的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: Loads the theme from the specified file path.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的文件路径加载主题。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> loaded from the filename specified.
trans-unit.target: 从指定文件名加载的新的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />。

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager to use to load the theme.
trans-unit.target: 要用于加载主题的序列化管理器。

trans-unit.source: The file path from which to load the theme.
trans-unit.target: 从中加载主题的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: Loads a new theme from the specified path using a serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化管理器从指定的路径加载新主题。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> loaded from the file path specified using the serialization manager specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的序列化管理器从指定文件路径加载的新的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />。

trans-unit.source: If your theme requires custom serialization, use this method to load your method using your custom serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: 如果主题需要自定义序列化，则可以使用此方法，通过自定义序列化管理器来加载所需的方法。

trans-unit.source: Loads a theme from the registry.
trans-unit.target: 从注册表中加载主题。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> loaded from the registry.
trans-unit.target: 从注册表加载的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />。

trans-unit.source: `LoadThemeSettingFromRegistry` loads
trans-unit.target: `LoadThemeSettingFromRegistry` 加载

trans-unit.source: Gets the file path from the registry.
trans-unit.target: 从注册表获取文件路径。

trans-unit.source: The file path from the registry to the theme.
trans-unit.target: 注册表中主题的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: The `FilePath` represents the path to the file that stores the theme settings.
trans-unit.target: `FilePath` 表示存储主题设置的文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the theme.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置主题的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the theme.
trans-unit.target: 主题的名称。

trans-unit.source: Use the name to uniquely identify the theme among other themes.
trans-unit.target: 使用名称来唯一地标识主题。

trans-unit.source: The property value cannot be set because the workflow theme is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 由于工作流主题是只读的，因此不能设置属性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workflow theme is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工作流主题是否为只读。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workflow theme is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作流主题为只读，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set and un-set the `ReadOnly` property for the purposes of setting the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置和取消设置 `ReadOnly` 属性以设置 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自“跟踪配置文件设计器”SDK 示例。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [跟踪配置文件设计器示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the registry key path for the theme.
trans-unit.target: 获取主题的注册表项路径。

trans-unit.source: The registry key path for the theme.
trans-unit.target: 主题的注册表项路径。

trans-unit.source: Use the registry key to provide a unique place in the Windows registry to save theme information.
trans-unit.target: 使用注册表项可在 Windows 注册表中提供一个用于保存主题信息的唯一位置。

trans-unit.source: The file in which to save the <see langword="WorkflowTheme" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中保存 <see langword="WorkflowTheme" /> 的文件。

trans-unit.source: Saves a theme to a file.
trans-unit.target: 将主题保存到文件。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.Save%2A> to persist a theme to a file.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.Save%2A> 可将主题保持到文件中。

trans-unit.source: Saves a theme to the registry.
trans-unit.target: 将主题保存到注册表。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.SaveThemeSettingToRegistry%2A> to save the theme to the registry using the key specified by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.RegistryKeyPath%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 通过 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.SaveThemeSettingToRegistry%2A>，可以使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.RegistryKeyPath%2A> 所指定的注册表项，将主题保存到注册表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of standard themes.
trans-unit.target: 获取标准主题的列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of available themes.
trans-unit.target: 可用主题的列表。

trans-unit.source: Releases the managed resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> 占用的托管资源。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a theme changes.
trans-unit.target: 当主题发生更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ThemeChanged> occurs when properties of the theme changes, or when a theme is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 当主题的属性发生更改或加载主题时，将发生 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ThemeChanged>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the theme.
trans-unit.target: 获取主题的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeType" /> of the theme.
trans-unit.target: 主题的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ThemeType" />。

trans-unit.source: Possible values are <see langword="Default" />, <see langword="System" />, and <see langword="UserDefined" />.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值包括 <see langword="Default" />、<see langword="System" /> 和 <see langword="UserDefined" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version of the theme.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置主题的版本。

trans-unit.source: The version information for the theme.
trans-unit.target: 主题的版本信息。

trans-unit.source: Use the version information to indicate successive improvements to a named theme.
trans-unit.target: 使用版本信息可指示对命名主题的后续改进。

trans-unit.source: The property value cannot be set because the workflow theme is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 由于工作流主题是只读的，因此不能设置属性值。
